issue.title: [Python] Basic Group By functionality in pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14607](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14607). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Pyarrow currently lacks a group by functionality even though all the building blocks are available. It would be good to expose a very simple to use group_by function leaving more complex use cases to the execution engine once IR execution is available.
